snippet.title: REVO - Out Now! - Official Gameplay Trailer (2021)
snippet.description:
Buy REVO on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1662790/REVO/
Buy REVO on Itch.io: https://cosmicmisfitstudio.itch.io/revo
Press keys available upon request: https://dodistribute.com/access/hlctBjnzad/

Launch date: August 24th, 2021
Platforms: Windows, Mac, & Linux

You’ve drifted into a sinister space storm far from civilization. Dark ships quickly close in on you. Rescued by a mysterious symbiotic vessel, your only hope of escape is to equip for combat and fight for your life. Neon shoot ‘em up to a retro fueled synthwave soundtrack.
